name: pjin1i
body: |- wceq(cfv(cpjh, cin(c0, c1)), ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, cin(c0, c1))))

stmt.pretty: mpbi(((projh ` c0)∘(projh `(c0 ⋂ c1)))=(projh `(c0 ⋂ c1)), (c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c0)

body.origin:

body.pretty:
⊢ ((projh ` c0)∘(projh `(c0 ⋂ c1)))=(projh `(c0 ⋂ c1))
⊣ (c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c0
⊣ ((c0 ⋂ c1)⊆ c0 ↔((projh ` c0)∘(projh `(c0 ⋂ c1)))=(projh `(c0 ⋂ c1)))
